name: Eugene Araullo
description: Currently the Energy Research and Program Development Director at Meralco Power Academy, Eugene is a multi-disciplinary professional with more than twenty-five years (25) of professional leadership roles and experience in the energy business. He is currently developing various Renewable Energy technology solutions projects for strategic clients to achieve an energy efficient and environmental friendly ecosystem. He has worked alongside USAID, Bhutan Power, Nigeria Academy, Ethiopia Electric Utility, Philex Mining, Tarlac Electric, Schneider Electric, Papua New Guinea Power, Tanzanian Electricity, Korea Power Exchange, IERE-Japan, and among others including local government agencies and the academe.

name: Arland Guzman
description: A motivated Marketing and Sales practioner with over 10 years in the industry. Arland has extensive experience conducting in-depth market research and creating distinguished marketing campaigns for renown Filipino brands. Previously a business owner with over 10 years of experience in the printing and graphics industry providing quality work for the likes of Jollibee Food Corp, Toshiba, Rustan's brands, Gokongwei group of companes, Let's Face It, Don Bosco Educational Centers Philippines, and St. Paul College Pasig.
